definition: a flattened rigid plate forming part of the body covering of many animals, size or measure according to a scale
details:
noun
- a flattened rigid plate forming part of the body covering of many animals
- a metal sheathing of uniform thickness (such as the shield attached to an artillery piece to protect the gunners)
= synonyms: shell, plate
- an indicator having a graduated sequence of marks
- a measuring instrument for weighing
= synonyms: weighing machine
- (music) a series of notes differing in pitch according to a specific scheme (usually within an octave)
= synonyms: musical scale
- a thin flake of dead epidermis shed from the surface of the skin
= synonyms: scurf, exfoliation
- a specialized leaf or bract that protects a bud or catkin
= synonyms: scale leaf
- relative magnitude
= example: relative magnitude
- the ratio between the size of something and a representation of it
= example: the ratio between the size of something and a representation of it
- an ordered reference standard
= example: an ordered reference standard
= synonyms: scale of measurement, graduated table, ordered series
verb
- size or measure according to a scale
= example: size or measure according to a scale
- measure with or as if with scales
= example: measure with or as if with scales
- remove the scales from
= example: remove the scales from
= synonyms: descale
- pattern, make, regulate, set, measure, or estimate according to some rate or standard
- climb up by means of a ladder
- reach the highest point of
